overview: Alicia J. Alexander is Chief Consultant at Image Werks, LLC. Ms. Alexander attracts, retains, and promotes Business clients in their overall Business Development and Financial Management goals through employing “Social/New Media.” Image Werks, LLC is the brainchild of Ms. Alexander since July, 2005. Ms. Alexander has over twenty years of experience in Sales, Marketing, and Accounting with such companies such as AT&T Corporation, First American Corporation, and Lifespan. Image Werks, LLC has worked with authors and other business leaders in various business capacities. http://xeeme.com/AJAlexander_ImageWerksLLC

web_presences.title: Alicia J Alexander Web Presence Aggregator
